column2: "Mereka akyerɛ hom wɔ nokwar mu dɛ
column3: Nyia onndua abowano nnkɔ nguambuw no mu
column4: na ɔfow fa beebi no

column2: "na nyia odua abowano kɔ mu no nye nguan no hwɛfo."
"Ɔno na abowanohwɛfo no bue ma no
column3: na nguan no tse ne ndze
column4: na ɔbɔ nankasa no nguan dzin frɛ hɔn

column2: "Na sɛ ɔdze nankasa no nguan nyina pue a
column4: na nguan no dzi n’ekyir

column2: "Na ɔnana dze
column4: na woboguan efi ne nkyɛn

column2: "Abɛbusɛm yi na Jesus kaa kyerɛɛ hɔn
column4: woennhu asɛm kor a Jesus reka kyerɛ hɔn no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Jesus see hɔn bio dɛ
column3: Mereka no nokwar mu akyerɛ hom dɛ
column4: emi nye nguan no abow no."

column2: "Hɔn a wodzii me kan bae no nyina yɛ ewifo nye edwotwafo; naaso nguan no enntsie hɔn."
"Emi nye abow no; emi na sɛ obiara nam mo do kɔ mu a
column4: na ɔbɔkɔ mu bopue

column2: "Owifo no mmba gyedɛ orubowia
column4: na ɔasɛɛ; emi dze

column2: "Emi nye oguanhwɛfo pa no: oguanhwɛfo pa no dze no nkwa to hɔ ma nguan no."
"Naaso ɔpaanyi no a ɔnnyɛ oguanhwɛfo a nguan no yɛ nankasa nedze no
column4: ogya nguan no hɔ na oguan; na pataku no ba bɔtotɔr hɔn na ɔbɔ hɔn petse."

column2: "Ɔpaanyi guan
column3: osiandɛ ɔyɛ ɔpaanyi na ɔnndwen nguan no ho."

column2: "Emi nye oguanhwɛfo pa no: minyim medze
column5: "dɛ mbrɛ Egya no nyim me na emi so minyim Egya no. Na medze mo nkwa to hɔ ma nguan no."

column2: "Na mowɔ nguan bi so a wommfi ban yi mu; hɔn so otwar dɛ medze hɔn meba
column4: na wɔaayɛ kuw kor nye oguanhwɛfo kor."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na Egya no dɔ me
column3: osiandɛ medze mo nkwa to hɔ na maafa no bio."

column2: "Obi nngye no me nsamu; na mbom mankasa na medze to hɔ: mowɔ tum dɛ medze to hɔ
column3: na mowɔ tum dɛ mefa no bio. Ahyɛdze yi na minyaa no m’Egya hɔ."

column2: "Na mpaapaamu bi baa Jewfo no mu bio wɔ asɛm yi ntsi."
"Na hɔn mu pii see dɛ
column4: na ɔabɔ dam: ɔyɛ dɛn na hom ritsie no?"

column2: "Binom see dɛ
column3: Iyi nnyɛ nyia ɔwɔ abɔnsam ne nsɛm a. Aso abɔnsam botum ebue onyifuranyi enyiwa anaa?"

column2: "Nna asɔrfi ne ntsewho afahyɛ no edu wɔ Jerusalɛm: na awɔwber so aba."
"Nna Jesus nenam asɔrfi no mu wɔ Solomon abrandaa no mu."
"Na Jewfo no botwae hyiaa no
column4: Ebɛma hɛn enyi ada kwan ekesi dabɛn bio? Sɛ ɔwo nye Kraest no a

column2: "Jesus buaa hɔn dɛ
column4: na hom nngye nndzi; ndwuma a menam m’Egya ne dzin do meyɛ no

column2: "Na hom dze
column4: osiandɛ hom mmfi mo nguan mu."

column2: "Mo nguan tsie me ndze
column4: na wodzi m’ekyir:"

column2: "na mema hɔn onnyiewiei nkwa
column4: eso obi runnhwim hɔn wɔ me nsamu."

column2: "M’Egya a ɔdze hɔn ama me no
column3: ɔyɛ kɛse kyɛn adze nyina na obi nnkotum ehwim hɔn m’Egya ne nsamu."

column2: "Emi nye Egya no yɛ kor."
"Jewfo no faa abo bio dɛ wɔdze besiw no."
"Jesus buaa hɔn dɛ
column3: Ndwuma pa pii na mifi m’Egya nkyɛn dze akyerɛ hom: ndwuma yi mu dza ɔwɔ hen ntsi na hom ribesiw me abo yi?"

column2: "Jewfo no buaa dɛ
column3: Nnyɛ edwuma pa bi ntsi na yeribesiw wo abo
column4: na ebususɛm ntsi a; osiandɛ ɔwo a eyɛ nyimpa yi

column2: "Jesus buaa hɔn dɛ
column3: Ana wɔnnkyerɛwee wɔ hom mbra mu dɛ
column4: Mekaa dɛ hom yɛ enyame?"

column2: "Sɛ ɔfrɛɛ hɔn a Nyankopɔn asɛm baa hɔn hɔ no enyame a
column3: na kyerɛwsɛm no so wonntum nnsan no
column5: "ana hom tum ka wɔ nyia Egya no etu no esi hɔ na ɔasoma no wiadze no ho dɛ

column2: "Sɛ mennyɛ m’Egya ndwuma a
"na sɛ meyɛ a
column3: kaansa hom nngye emi ara nndzi mpo a
column4: hom ngye ndwuma no ndzi
column5: ama hom aatse ase na hom eehu dɛ Egya no wɔ mo mu na mo so mowɔ no mu."

column2: "Na wɔhwehwɛɛ bio dɛ wɔkyer no
"Na osii mu kɔr Jordan egya noho bio
column3: mbrɛ nkan no nna John runuma no; na ɔkɛtsenaa hɔ."

column2: "Na dodowara baa ne nkyɛn
column4: John dze
column5: ɔannyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze biara: na dza John kae wɔ oyi ho nyina yɛ nokwar."

column2: "Na dodowara gyee no dzii wɔ hɔ."
